item.description: Change 'type' above to try different Selector Component Types like Sequencer

items.content: Would you prefer a high energy dog or a low energy dog?
items.description: Expand on 'items' array to add multiple prompts, use response template arguments by adding it to 'content' like this ${payload.input_argument_name} and add SSML by changing 'contentType' to 'SSML' and adding SSML to 'content' <amazon:effect name="whispered">like that</amazon:effect>

items.content: Do your friends describe you as high energy or low energy?
items.description: Expand on 'items' array to add multiple prompts, use response template arguments by adding it to 'content' like this ${payload.input_argument_name} and add SSML by changing 'contentType' to 'SSML' and adding SSML to 'content' <amazon:effect name="whispered">like that</amazon:effect>
